settings.content: It is with deep regret that we announce the end of our timeless leather boot collection at unbeatable prices. We would like to express our sincere gratitude to everyone who has supported this collection and trusted our craftsmanship. We are incredibly thankful for your loyalty and love. The remaining models are the last available and will soon be removed from the site. Donâ€™t miss the opportunity to acquire these unique pieces before itâ€™s too late.

settings.title: WHY ARE WE FORCED TO CLOSE OUR STORE?
settings.content:
My husband and I have made the difficult decision to close our shopâ€¦ ðŸ’” For years, we have poured our passion into creating unique pieces â€“ coats, jackets, sweaters, and more â€“ with the hope of sharing a part of ourselves with you. Unfortunately, managing the online store has faced unexpected challenges: unsold inventory, disappointing collaborations, and limited funds.

To close this chapter, we are clearing out our stock with discounts of up to 80%. These pieces, our favorites, will soon disappear. By purchasing, you support our journey and help us turn the page.

Thank you for your understanding and support.

With gratitude,

Evoque Team
